current.promo_text: free shipping on all orders over $100
current.supported_currencies: USD CAD AUD GBP EUR JPY
current.feature1_description: Our fragrances are born out of a passion for exceptional ingredients and combinations. No marketing or data-driven approaches here, just a pure love of bringing new fragrance concepts to life and sharing them with the world.
current.feature2_description: Each fragrance is designed, formulated and produced by hand using a library of over 2,000 raw materials and ingredients.
current.feature3_description: We do not produce in bulk or hold inventory.  Each product is made-to-order and assembled by hand after purchase, ensuring the best possible freshness, quality and performance for every fragrance.
